title: Knee Rehabilitation Plan
description: Personalized rehabilitation plan for Knee recovery

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.description: Lie face down and bend your knee, bringing your heel toward your buttock

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.description: Step up onto a platform with one leg, then the other

exercises.name: Knee Extensions
exercises.description: Sit in a chair and straighten your knee

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie flat on your back and lift your leg straight up

exercises.name: Wall Squats
exercises.description: Stand with your back against a wall and bend your knees
